profile_summary:
As an accomplished Site Reliability Engineer with 8 years of experience, I excel in CI/CD automation, utilizing **GitHub Actions** and **Azure DevOps** to ensure reliable software delivery. My technical expertise encompasses **Infrastructure-as-Code** using **Terraform**, **Azure Bicep**, and **ARM Templates**, enabling efficient deployment and management of cloud infrastructure on **Azure** and **VMware vSphere**. I bring strong skills in **Linux**, **PowerShell**, and **Bash** for robust system administration across Windows and macOS environments. 
I have a proven track record of optimizing operational performance through deep insights from **Azure Monitor** and **Log Analytics**, while adhering to best practices in **Git workflows**. My background in mentoring teams enhances effectiveness and fosters a culture of problem-solving and communication. Additionally, I leverage my experience in full-stack development with **React**, **Node.js**, and **Python** to bridge gaps between development and operations, driving innovations in infrastructure stability and application reliability.
